question: What is the name of the traditional garden in Kanazawa City, Japan, known as one of the three great gardens of Japan?
asked_question_translated: Hvad hedder den traditionelle have i Kanazawa City i Japan, der er kendt som en af Japans tre store haver?
answer: Den traditionelle have i Kanazawa City, der er kendt som en af Japans tre store haver, hedder Kenrokuen.
answer_translated_eng: The traditional garden in Kanazawa City, known as one of Japan's three great gardens, is called Kenrokuen.
